com.citytechinc.cq.component.dialog.selection
Class SelectionWidgetMaker

java.lang.Object
  com.citytechinc.cq.component.dialog.maker.AbstractWidgetMaker
      com.citytechinc.cq.component.dialog.selection.SelectionWidgetMaker
All Implemented Interfaces:
WidgetMaker
public class SelectionWidgetMaker
extends AbstractWidgetMaker

Builds a SelectionWidget from an annotated field. This maker will operate with or without a stacked Selection annotation.
